‚úÖ Since January 2025, gold is up 53%, silver 74%, and Bitcoin 23%. Fund flows from gold and silver are likely to shift into Bitcoin and Ethereum soon.

We will see a parabolic Q4. Don‚Äôt get shaken out in these manipulation dumps.

$MSFT TO RENT NSCALE DATA CENTER CAPACITY IN PORTUGAL

Microsoft is expanding its AI infra in Europe by leasing capacity from Nscale at the ~$10B Start Campus in Portugal which will deploy 13K $NVDA Blackwell Ultra GPUs & come online in 2026.

$SPY AT A HUGE LEVEL

Since the tariff-war bottom the market has stayed above the 50-day. This is the first time price has closed into it with real volume & momentum behind the move.

The 50-day is finally in play. Hold it & the uptrend resets but lose it & character changes.

China produces ~60% of the world‚Äôs rare earths & handles ~90% of processing. 

The real challenge now is breaking that grip & the U.S. is slowly building the pieces to take some of that control back. 

Here‚Äôs what the U.S. rare earth supply chain is starting to look like:

‚Ä¢ $MP is the leading U.S. rare earth producer operating & expanding into processing.
‚Ä¢ $USAR & $IDR are early exploration names working to prove new U.S. deposits.
‚Ä¢ $CRML & $TMRC are building toward integrated mining/refining to bring capacity back onshore.
‚Ä¢ $AREC is extracting rare earths from coal waste to accelerate domestic supply.
‚Ä¢ $UUUU is one of the few U.S. players already separating rare earths at scale.
‚Ä¢ $IPX is developing new refining technology to expand domestic output.

Every tech cycle starts with infrastructure but the real upside comes when applications turn capacity into products.

In the internet era $AMZN & $GOOGL built on top of the pipes to turn raw connectivity into commerce & information flow.

And it‚Äôs starting to look like in the AI era $NVDA built the rails while $PLTR & OpenAI are building the layers that will capture the value.

$ORCL TO DEPLOY 50K $AMD MI450 AI GPUS STARTING IN 2026

It‚Äôs one of the largest AMD cloud wins to date & signals Oracle‚Äôs push to scale its AI infrastructure beyond $NVDA supply constraints.

$CRM PARTNERS WITH OPENAI

Agentforce 360 will now run inside ChatGPT letting users pull sales data, analyze customer interactions & build dashboards by typing a prompt.

$AVGO introduced Thor Ultra, a networking chip that doubles bandwidth to link massive AI data centers. 

It goes head to head with $NVDA as Broadcom targets a $90B AI interconnect market by 2027.

$AVGO CEO said gen AI could lift tech‚Äôs share of global GDP from 30% to 40%. 

He‚Äôs basically saying AI is about to reprice productivity across the entire economy.

Anthropic recently revealed that its newest model, Claude Sonnet 4.5, can maintain focus and code on its own for 30 hours straight, a 4.5x increase from its 4.0 models that could code for seven hours.

$MSFT $AMZN $GOOG $NVDA

Microsoft $MSFT is launching two new cloud regions in south central India and Taiwan in 2026, following its launch of two new regions in Indonesia and Malaysia this year. 

$AMZN $GOOG $ORCL

Micron $MU says that it has expanded its HBM customer base to six customers, and is in active discussions for HBM4 volumes and expects to sell the remainder of its 2026 supply over the next few months.

$NVDA $AMD $AVGO

Alphabet $GOOG recorded its biggest quarterly gain in more than 20 years, rising 38% in the third quarter, with a more positive resolution on its antitrust case and strong growth for its Gemini AI offering.
OpenAI has now committed to up to 26GW of chips between Nvidia $NVDA, AMD $AMD and Broadcom $AVGO.

OpenAI and Broadcom $AVGO signed a deal to develop 10 GW of custom chips to be deployed in OpenAI-owned and third-party data centers. 

Broadcom will begin deploying the AI accelerator racks in the second half of 2026, and finish by 2029.
